mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM BOARD

SELECT C.CODE_NAME as CODE_NAME ,B.BOARD_TYPE ,B.BOARD_NUM ,B.BOARD_TITLE ,B.BOARD_COMMENT FROM BOARD B JOIN COM_CODE C ON B.BOARD_TYPE = C.CODE_ID WHERE C.CODE_ID = #{boardType} AND B.BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}

INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT ,CREATOR ,CREATE_TIME ,MODIFIER ,MODIFIED_TIME ) VALUES (#{boardType} ,(SELECT NVL(TO_NUMBER(MAX(BOARD_NUM)+1),1) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType}) ,#{boardTitle} ,#{boardComment} ,'SYSTEM' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) ,'SYSTEM' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) )
